school - Variable in class Administrator
 
School - Class in <Unnamed>
This class defines the School, which is where all our Students are taught and our Instructors work.
School(String) - Constructor for class School
Creates a School object and initializes the schoolName, schoolSubjects, schoolCourses, schoolStudents, schoolInstructors, maxEnrollableCourses and maxAssignableCourses properties using the given parameters.
schoolCourses - Variable in class School
 
schoolCreator(String) - Method in class SimulationUtility
Creates a School object with the specified name, maxEnrollableCourses and maxAssignableCourses.

schoolStudents - Variable in class School

Subject's description setter method.
setInstructor(Instructor) - Method in class Course
Tries to assign the Instructor passed as parameter to this course.

School's maxAssignableCourses setter method.

School's maxEnrollableCourses setter method.
setup(String) - Method in class SimulationUtility
Initializes the BufferedReader and reads the configuration file passed as parameter one line at a time.
SimulationUtility - Class in <Unnamed>
This class defines a SimulationUtility object which is the tool used by the Administrator's main method to read the configuration file and run the School simulation accordingly.
SimulationUtility() - Constructor for class SimulationUtility
 
specialism - Variable in class Subject
 
status - Variable in class Course
 
Student - Class in <Unnamed>
This class defines a Student object.
Student(String, char, int) - Constructor for class Student
Creates a new Student object and initializes the name, gender, age, attendedCourses and certificates properties.
studentsLeaving() - Method in class Administrator
Iterating over each School's Student, removes graduated students and simulates the 5% possibility that a student who is not enrolled to any course leaves the school.
subject - Variable in class Course
 
Subject - Class in <Unnamed>
This class defines a Subject object.
Subject(int, int, int) - Constructor for class Subject
Creates a new Subject object and initializes its name, ID, specialism, duration and prerequisites variables.
subjectCreator(String) - Method in class SimulationUtility
Creates a Subject object with the specified description, id, specialism and duration.
